            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609494060&amp;ssig=JWgzkx%2Fpuy" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479032458597616" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix9ZHA4De?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 08:26" date="1583368017000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479032458597616:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 08:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A180409%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市累计80409例新冠肺炎病例#</a> 其中<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E131%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#武汉新增131例新冠肺炎#</a>】3月4日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例139例，新增死亡病例31例（湖北31例），新增疑似病例143例。<br>　　当日新增治愈出院病例2189例，解除医学观察的密切接触者6584人，重症病例减少464例。<br> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix9ZHA4De" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4479032458597616:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4479032458597616&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A12668%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#中国境外确诊12668例新冠肺炎#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%88%E6%9C%894%E5%9B%BD%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#又有4国出现新冠肺炎#</a>】世卫组织发布报告，截至欧洲中部时间4日上午10时，中国境外确诊新冠肺炎12668例，死亡214例。与前一日报告相比，中国境外新增新冠肺炎2103例，新增4个国家（阿根廷、智利、波兰、乌克兰）出现新冠肺炎病例。（总台记者朱赫） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                        <div comment_id="4479014893170406" node-type="root_comment" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/1449702243" usercard="id=1449702243">心血管科张医生</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a>：自从日韩美意出现疫情后， 批评中国的声音消停了很多。 ​没有对比就没有发言权，因为大家都发现， 即使是日韩美欧这样的发达国家， 也未见得应对比中国好。 ​反而是中国踩过的坑， 他们不仅一个个踩下去， ​而且有些做法对本国人民都匪夷所思！那些早期早期对中国各种漫骂， 现在都迅速被打脸了！        </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479012732500049" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix9tTaunn?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 07:08" date="1583363314000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479012732500049:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 07:08</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B33089%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#意大利确诊病例升至3089例#</a>】当地时间4日18时，意大利通报，迄今为止，意大利新冠肺炎累计病例已达3089例，累计死亡107例。（总台记者邓宗宇） ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4479010593930280" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix9qrgurC?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-05 07:00" date="1583362803000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4479010593930280:fromprofile"> 2020-3-5 07:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【今日<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%83%8A%E8%9B%B0%23&amp;from=default">#惊蛰#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/d4/2018new_xianhua_org.png" title="[鲜花]" alt="[鲜花]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%AE%E9%9B%A8%E4%BC%97%E5%8D%89%E6%96%B0%E4%B8%80%E9%9B%B7%E6%83%8A%E8%9B%B0%E5%A7%8B%23&amp;from=default">#微雨众卉新一雷惊蛰始#</a>，惊蛰是二十四节气中第三个节气，预示着仲春时节的开始。冬天从这里夺去的，春天会交还给你。疫情形势向好，但并未结束，还需继续“蛰伏”！等疫情结束，再共赴春的约会！转发加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                </div>
             </div>
           </div>
        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BD%93%E6%96%B9%E8%88%B1%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E5%B0%8F%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B%E8%AF%B4%E4%BB%96%E6%97%A0%E8%81%8A%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#当方舱医院小朋友说他无聊了#</a> <img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/7b/2018new_miaomiao_org.png" title="[喵喵]" alt="[喵喵]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】武汉方舱医院内，一位10岁的小朋友说“好无聊啊”。于是，医护人员火速安排上了↓↓<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8f/2018new_haha_org.png" title="[哈哈]" alt="[哈哈]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">网友：来自医生的关爱沉甸甸，全方位贴心“护理”！再也不怕跟不上学习进度了！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478911390272928:1034-video:1034%3A4478507355406399:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478911390272928:2656274875" title="中国长安网的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67phq91" alt="http://t.cn/A67phq91" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>中国长安网的微博视频</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E9%95%BF%E5%AE%89%E7%BD%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国长安网">@中国长安网</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E8%BF%87%E5%90%8E%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E5%B0%B1%E7%BB%93%E5%A9%9A%23&amp;from=default">#疫情过后我们就结婚#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】“待春暖花开你凯旋，我们就办婚礼”、“回来后，我娶你”……他们，将结婚誓词中的“风雨同舟，患难与共”，变成共同面对的担当，真切感人。有了所爱之人的陪伴支持，无论何时，都有更多勇气面对余生的未知。希望疫情过后，有情人都能时时携手，转发祝福！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E7%BD%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视网">@央视网</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix6KjzCe9" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478907598488429:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478907598488429&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B3%95%E5%9B%BD%E6%AD%A3%E5%BC%8F%E9%A2%81%E5%B8%83%E6%94%BF%E4%BB%A4%E5%BE%81%E7%94%A8%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#法国正式颁布政令征用口罩#</a>】当地时间4日，法国总理正式颁布政令：从3月3日起由法国卫生部统一征用法国口罩库存及产能，优先发放给公共卫生专业人员及感染新型冠状病毒的病患。征用范围包括：所有公立、私营企业的FFP2等级防护口罩库存，所有生产或销售厂家的防喷溅口罩库存，以及从政令颁布之日起 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix6DzrOln" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478903416628381:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478903416628381&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC50%E4%B8%AA%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E7%AB%99%E5%BC%80%E5%8D%96%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#北京50个加油站开卖口罩#</a> 每天3万只】3日起，中国石化在北京50座加油站销售一次性防护口罩，每人每周限购一次，一次一盒(10只)，每只售价3.5元。目前每日口罩总供应量为3万只。消费者可下载“易捷加油”APP，选取意向取货的加油站，点击“购物”、“到店自提”，支付成功后即可无接触提货。无车用户 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix6rplytT" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478895875137437:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478895875137437&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/piggypappy" usercard="id=6286864968">小猪爸爸PiggyPappy</a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member4"></em></a>：尊重市场规律，融喷布的价格从2万元每吨，涨价到35万元每吨，翻了至少16倍，按以前3毛钱一个的售价，正常来说现在应该卖到4.8元，所以3.5一个真不贵，低于这个价格的，我还不敢买<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/a1/2018new_doge02_org.png" title="[doge]" alt="[doge]" type="face">        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BB%E6%92%AD%E8%AF%B4%E8%81%94%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#主播说联播#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E8%AF%8A%E7%96%97%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%882%E4%B8%AA%E6%9C%88%E6%9B%B4%E6%96%B07%E7%89%88%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎诊疗方案2个月更新7版#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/e6/2018new_zan_org.png" title="[赞]" alt="[赞]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】今天，国家卫健委公布第七版新冠肺炎诊疗方案，其中有不少变化。比如首次加入新冠肺炎逝者的遗体解剖病理研究结果等。相关部门在近两个月内连续更新了7版诊疗方案，遇到新问题、发现有认识不到位的地方就及时作出调整，这是正视疾病的正确操作。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix6loszwW" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478892146809766:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478892146809766&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478884080489896" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix68o23ry?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 22:37" date="1583332641000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478884080489896:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 22:37</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%A2%E6%B5%AE%E5%AE%AB%E9%87%8D%E6%96%B0%E5%BC%80%E6%94%BE%23&amp;from=default">#卢浮宫重新开放#</a>】据法国媒体报道，当地时间4日中午，卢浮宫博物馆已重新恢复对公众开放。据了解，1日起，卢浮宫员工担忧新冠病毒扩散，集体表决通过利用“特殊的停工权力”暂时关闭了博物馆。早前，为控制疫情进一步恶化，法国政府宣布取消所有封闭环境中超过5000人的大型活动。（总台记者马瑾瑾） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E9%83%A8%E7%A7%B0%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E5%85%B3%E9%97%AD%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E4%BB%8D%E5%9C%A8%E8%AE%A8%E8%AE%BA%23&amp;from=default">#意大利教育部称是否关闭学校仍在讨论#</a>】当地时间4日，意大利教育部长露西娅·阿佐利纳表示，是否对学校采取关闭措施，部长会议已提请科教专业委员会进行评估，将在稍晚时宣布正式决定。此前据意大利当地媒体报道，所有学校及大学将关闭至3月中旬。（总台记者邓宗宇）                                            </div>
                                                                        <div class="WB_feed_expand">
                    <div class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg1_br"></i></div>
                    <div class="WB_expand S_bg1" node-type="feed_list_forwardContent">
                                                                            <div class="WB_info">
                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4478869232528341" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="央视新闻" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@央视新闻</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%85%B3%E9%97%AD%E5%A2%83%E5%86%85%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E8%87%B33%E6%9C%88%E4%B8%AD%E6%97%AC%23&amp;from=default">#意大利关闭境内所有学校至3月中旬#</a>】据安莎社，当地时间3月4日，意大利总理府举行的部长会议上决定，鉴于当前新冠肺炎疫情，意大利境内所有学校及大学将关闭至3月中旬。（总台记者邓宗宇） ​​​​                                                            </div>
                                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%85%B3%E9%97%AD%E5%A2%83%E5%86%85%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E8%87%B33%E6%9C%88%E4%B8%AD%E6%97%AC%23&amp;from=default">#意大利关闭境内所有学校至3月中旬#</a>】据安莎社，当地时间3月4日，意大利总理府举行的部长会议上决定，鉴于当前新冠肺炎疫情，意大利境内所有学校及大学将关闭至3月中旬。（总台记者邓宗宇） ​​​​                                            </div>

    <!-- 评论头像 -->
    <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen" usercard="id=2656274875">央视新闻</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>：【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E6%95%99%E8%82%B2%E9%83%A8%E7%A7%B0%E6%98%AF%E5%90%A6%E5%85%B3%E9%97%AD%E5%AD%A6%E6%A0%A1%E4%BB%8D%E5%9C%A8%E8%AE%A8%E8%AE%BA%23&amp;from=default">#意大利教育部称是否关闭学校仍在讨论#</a>】当地时间4日，意大利教育部长露西娅·阿佐利纳表示，是否对学校采取关闭措施，部长会议已提请科教专业委员会进行评估，将在稍晚时宣布正式决定。此前据意大利当地媒体报道，所有学校及大学将关闭至3月中旬。（总台记者邓宗宇）        </div>

                                                                                                                        【转起加油！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%BE%E5%BF%98%E7%9A%84%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%E7%9E%AC%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#难忘的战疫瞬间#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】刚刚过去的2月，是战疫情的关键时期。2月4日，火神山医院正式接诊；超4.2万名医护人员集结湖北；2月29日，全国口罩日产量1.16亿只，是2月1日的12倍；3月1日，武汉迎来首个方舱医院休舱……此刻，一起回顾战“疫”瞬间↓网友：武汉胜则湖北胜，湖北胜则全国胜！转！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix5wg6sFD" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478860441540181:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478860441540181&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【新疆医疗队队员：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E6%9B%BF%E5%A6%88%E5%A6%88%E5%8E%BB%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%AE%B6%E4%B9%A1%23&amp;from=default">#我替妈妈去守护家乡#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】“第一位治愈患者出院那天，是我们来武汉后最开心的日子”；“这就是我的工作，没有什么不同”；“我妈妈是湖北人，这一次，我该替妈妈去守护家乡”。明月出天山，千里援武汉！点击→<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478854007905461:1022-webpage:1022%3A231996_hero" title="我为家乡医疗队打call" href="http://t.cn/A6hu1K3r" alt="http://t.cn/A6hu1K3r" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>我为家乡医疗队打call</a> 为<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E7%9A%84%E5%90%8C%E4%B9%A1%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%23&amp;from=default">#我的同乡英雄#</a>点赞！转起加油，祝平安凯旋！ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix5lSxazr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478854007905461:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478854007905461&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

                                <a name="4478844574569416" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix56FjaIg?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 20:00" date="1583323221000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478844574569416:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 20:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【中国蝗灾防治工作组：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%99%E6%BC%A0%E8%9D%97%E8%99%AB%E8%BF%81%E5%BE%99%E5%88%B0%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%9A%84%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E6%80%A7%E5%BE%88%E5%B0%8F%23&amp;from=default">#沙漠蝗虫迁徙到中国的可能性很小#</a>】今天，中国蝗灾防治工作组即将结束对巴基斯坦为期10天的科考调研。工作组认为，巴基斯坦的沙漠蝗灾较为严重，但飞到我国的可能性很小。巴基斯坦的蝗灾发生在热带和亚热带的沙漠地区，我国没有适合的自然环境。从历史记录看，中国也没有沙漠蝗 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix56FjaIg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478844574569416:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478844574569416&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478840028370039" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix4Zkz7qD?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 19:42" date="1583322138000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478840028370039:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 19:42</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E50%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#马来西亚累计确诊新冠肺炎50例#</a>】当地时间4日下午，马来西亚卫生部总监召开记者会说，马来西亚新增14例新冠肺炎确诊病例，创下单日最高确诊病例纪录。新增的第37名患者至第50名患者当中，绝大部分都和第26名确诊患者有接触。目前马来西亚累计确诊病例50例，其中治愈出院22例。（总 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix4Zkz7qD" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478840028370039:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478840028370039&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B1%E5%90%8C%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#共同战疫#</a>【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B2922%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗累计确诊新冠肺炎病例2922例#</a> 防疫形势如何？】目前，伊朗确诊人数已位列全球第3。伊朗最高领袖哈梅内伊表示，各部门应密切合作，包括伊朗武装部队都应参与疫情防控工作。WHO和中国也已对伊朗进行了援助。伊朗普通民众如何防疫？看直播↓（总台记者倪紫慧）                                            </div>

                                <a suda-uatrack="key=feed_headnick&amp;value=transuser_nick:4478673019211800" node-type="feed_list_originNick" class="W_fb S_txt1" nick-name="央视新闻" bpfilter="page_frame" href="/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_">@央视新闻</a><a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>                            </div>
                            <div class="WB_text" node-type="feed_list_reason">
                                                                                                                                        【正在直播：赏花海看春耕&nbsp;&nbsp;<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%B0%8F%E7%9F%B3%E6%A6%B4%23&amp;from=default">#云守护小石榴#</a>】今天，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视新闻">@央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B1%E5%90%8C%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#共同战疫#</a>不间断直播将带来美、英国、日、韩等国疫情动态；带你看武汉华南海鲜市场、韩国首尔火车站消杀现场；实地探访支援湖北医护人员；看各地复工复课准备；早间云赏花海，看春耕春播；晚间一起守护小石榴…关注！&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478673019211800:2656274875" href="/2656274875/Ix0DXCEpq" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478673019211800">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478836743766584" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix4U2fNRm?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 19:29" date="1583321355000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478836743766584:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 19:29</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E240%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#德国累计确诊新冠肺炎240例#</a>】据德国联邦疾控机构罗伯特·科赫研究所3月4日公布的数据，截至3月4日10点，德国已累计确诊新冠肺炎患者240例。（总台记者 李长皓） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478831894738170" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix4MdjSC6?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 19:09" date="1583320199000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478831894738170:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 19:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B586%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗单日新增确诊病例586例#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BC%8A%E6%9C%97%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B2922%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#伊朗累计确诊新冠肺炎病例2922例#</a>】截至当地时间4日中午，据伊朗卫生部，伊朗单日新增新冠肺炎病例586例，新增死亡病例15例。目前，伊朗共确诊新冠肺炎病例2922例，其中552例康复，92例死亡。(总台记者李健南 倪紫慧) ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478829533487880" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix4IpeDm8?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 19:00" date="1583319636000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478829533487880:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 19:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

                                <a name="4478825230684757" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix4Bt2S8t?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 18:43" date="1583318610000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478825230684757:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 18:43</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【征集！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%8A%8A%E6%9C%80%E7%BE%8E%E7%9A%84%E5%A5%B9%E5%86%99%E8%BF%9B%E8%AF%97%E9%87%8C%23&amp;from=default">#把最美的她写进诗里#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】她们，是医生，是护士，是科学家，是警察，是教师，是基建工人，是社区工作者…疫情当前，她们带着非凡的勇气走向“战场”，用柔弱的肩膀保护着世界。这样的她们，值得被看见，也应该被记住。带话题<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E5%A5%B9%E5%86%99%E8%AF%97%23&amp;from=default">#为她写诗#</a>发微博，你的作品可能被<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=央视新闻">@央视新闻</a> 选用。不求文采斐然， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix4Bt2S8t" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478825230684757:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478825230684757&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478820834906680" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix4unkAs0?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 18:26" date="1583317562000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478820834906680:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 18:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%BB%91%E9%BE%99%E6%B1%9F%E7%9C%81%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%A7%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%E8%B0%83%E6%95%B4%E4%B8%BA%E4%BA%8C%E7%BA%A7%23&amp;from=default">#黑龙江省一级响应调整为二级#</a>】今天，在黑龙江省疫情联防联控发布会上，黑龙江省应对新冠肺炎疫情工作领导小组指挥部办公室副主任王大为介绍：将黑龙江省新冠肺炎疫情防控应急响应等级，由重大突发公共卫生事件一级应急响应调整为二级应急响应。目前，黑龙江已连续10天无新增确诊病例。（总台央视记 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix4unkAs0" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478820834906680:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478820834906680&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【教育部：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%AF%E9%80%82%E5%BD%93%E9%A1%BA%E5%BB%B6%E5%A4%8F%E5%AD%A3%E6%AF%95%E4%B8%9A%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E7%94%9F%E5%AD%A6%E4%BD%8D%E6%8E%88%E4%BA%88%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#可适当顺延夏季毕业研究生学位授予时间#</a>】教育部日前印发通知，明确：①可组织已完成学位论文春季毕业研究生开展远程视频答辩；②合理调整优化夏季毕业研究生学位论文送审、答辩和学位授予工作的时间、方式与流程，努力保障符合条件的研究生按期获得学位；③对因疫情影响无法按时完成学位论 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix4nrnOwH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478816535675771:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478816535675771&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609494077&amp;ssig=ABI5jmNyTH" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478812228545030" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix4guzQX4?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 17:51" date="1583315509000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478812228545030:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 17:51</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%96%E5%B0%94%E6%8B%9F%E5%90%8A%E9%94%80%E6%96%B0%E5%A4%A9%E5%9C%B0%E6%95%99%E4%BC%9A%E6%B3%95%E4%BA%BA%E6%89%A7%E7%85%A7%23&amp;from=default">#首尔拟吊销新天地教会法人执照#</a>】截至当地时间4日16时，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B35621%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#韩国新冠肺炎确诊病例升至5621例#</a>。在全部确诊感染者中，超半数感染者的流行病学调查都指向了大邱“新天地”教会所举行的宗教活动。韩国政府要求教会提供全部人员名单以进行排查时，“新天地”教会被指通过各种手段隐瞒真实情况。3日，首尔市 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix4guzQX4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478812228545030:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478812228545030&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478807635377428" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix495myUI?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 17:33" date="1583314414000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478807635377428:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 17:33</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%9A%8A%E5%AD%90%E4%BC%9A%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#蚊子会不会传播新冠病毒#</a>？】上海中医药大学附属曙光医院主任医师崔松：目前，还没有证据表明新型冠状病毒会通过蚊子的叮咬传播。但是现在春季来了，气温逐渐升高，灭蚊倒是正当时，希望大家做好清洁卫生工作。“蚊子传播新型冠状病毒”的说法莫须有，但做好防蚊灭蚊、个人防护工作必须有。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478805248327640" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix45eyWoM?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 17:24" date="1583313846000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478805248327640:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 17:24</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%9E%E8%87%B328%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#印度新冠肺炎病例增至28例#</a>】印度卫生部当地时间4日开发布会，宣布印度新冠肺炎确诊病例升至28例。今日新增病例为22例，包括稍早前检查结果呈阳性的15名意大利游客，和为该旅游团担任司机的1名印度人。此外，3日在阿格拉发现的6名疑似病例也已确诊。（总台记者李琳） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">

            </li>
        </ul>
    
<!-- /VideoCard -->

    </div>
        <!-- super card-->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478800043356221" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix3WQe56B?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 17:03" date="1583312605000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478800043356221:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 17:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B3%A2%E5%85%B0%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#波兰出现首例新冠肺炎确诊病例#</a>】当地时间3月4日早上，波兰卫生部长乌卡什·舒莫夫斯基召开新闻发布会，宣布波兰本土确诊首例新冠肺炎感染病例。该患者自称是一名医生，近期从德国返回波兰，目前正在接受治疗，据称其身体状况尚好。卫生部长表示，所有与该患者有密切接触的人都已隔离，呼吁民众不要 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix3WQe56B" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478800043356221:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478800043356221&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <ul>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478798118029965" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix3TJxGXz?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 16:55" date="1583312146000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478798118029965:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 16:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【外交部：新冠病毒源头尚不确定 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9D%9A%E5%86%B3%E5%8F%8D%E5%AF%B9%E5%9C%B0%E5%9F%9F%E7%9A%84%E6%B1%A1%E5%90%8D%E5%8C%96%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80%23&amp;from=default">#坚决反对地域的污名化语言#</a>】今天，中国外交部发言人赵立坚表示，个别媒体称新冠病毒是“中国病毒”极不负责任，我们对此坚决反对。①目前病毒溯源工作仍在进行中，尚无定论。世卫组织多次表示，新冠病毒是全球现象，源头尚不确定，此时应关注如何应对遏制病毒，避免 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix3TJxGXz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478798118029965:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478798118029965&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4478794397743300" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix3NJwunW?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 16:40" date="1583311259000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478794397743300:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 16:40</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%91%9E%E5%A3%AB%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%A2%9E%E8%87%B358%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#瑞士新冠肺炎增至58例#</a>】据瑞士媒体报道，截止至当地时间4日早上8点，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%91%9E%E5%A3%AB%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B13%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#瑞士新增新冠肺炎确诊病例13例#</a>，瑞士境内确诊病例总计58例，2例治愈出院。瑞士也成为全球受此病毒感染最严重的二十国之一。瑞士联邦政府上周宣布，3月15日之前，取消1000人以上的大型集会。（总台记者薛婧萌） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8D%87%E8%87%B35621%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#韩国新冠肺炎确诊病例升至5621例#</a>】韩国中央防疫对策本部4日下午通报，4日0-16时，韩国新增新冠肺炎确诊病例293例，累计确诊病例已升至5621例。（总台记者 李大杰） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#北京疫情防控工作发布会#</a>】今天下午，北京市召开疫情防控新闻发布会，北京市住建委、北京市应急管理局、北京市市场监管局、北京市城管执法局、《北京市新型冠状病毒肺炎病例临床路径》起草组等有关单位和专家将发布解读，并答记者问。关注！（总台央视记者张伟泽） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478784935823339:1034-video:1034%3A4478799912304671:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478784935823339:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67WNika" alt="http://t.cn/A67WNika" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478784180385571" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix3xg1CiT?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 16:00" date="1583308823000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478784180385571:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 16:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E5%90%84%E5%9C%B0%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E7%8E%87%E8%BE%BE87.3%25%23&amp;from=default">#湖北以外各地治愈率达87.3%#</a>】国家卫健委新闻发言人米锋：截至3月3日，武汉新冠肺炎治愈率达50.2%，湖北除武汉外治愈率76.8%。其他省区市治愈率为87.3%。武汉、湖北、全国治愈率连续19日上升。加油！期待更多好消息！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4478784180385571:1034-video:1034%3A4478784125206562:page_100206_home:2656274875:4478784180385571:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A67WCf3k" alt="http://t.cn/A67WCf3k" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BF%84%E7%BD%97%E6%96%AF%E7%A6%81%E6%AD%A2%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E7%AD%89%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%23&amp;from=default">#俄罗斯禁止口罩等医疗物资出口#</a>】当地时间4日，俄罗斯政府在其官网上发布公告，即日起至2020年6月1日，俄罗斯将禁止部分医疗物资的出口，包括口罩、绷带、一次性医用手套、一次性医疗防护服、医用防护镜、呼吸机、消毒液和外科手术服等，但用于国际人道主义援助以及供个人使用的一次性医疗用品除外 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix3oBaP7t" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478778812579787:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478778812579787&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E7%9C%81%E5%8F%B8%E6%B3%95%E5%8E%85%E5%8E%9F%E5%85%9A%E5%A7%94%E4%B9%A6%E8%AE%B0%E7%AD%8911%E4%BA%BA%E8%A2%AB%E7%AB%8B%E6%A1%88%E5%AE%A1%E6%9F%A5%E8%B0%83%E6%9F%A5%23&amp;from=default">#山东省司法厅原党委书记等11人被立案审查调查#</a>】记者从山东省纪委监委、山东省委政法委获悉，经前期对任城监狱发生新冠肺炎疫情问题调查，山东省纪检监察机关已对省司法厅原党委书记、厅长，省监狱管理局原党委书记、第一政委解维俊，省监狱管理局原党委副书记、政委姜运华，省监狱管理局原党委委员 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix3jAzo5N" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478775708434095:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478775708434095&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4478771820336501" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/Ix3dk1pxr?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-04 15:11" date="1583305876000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4478771820336501:fromprofile"> 2020-3-4 15:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E7%9C%81%E4%BB%BB%E5%9F%8E%E7%9B%91%E7%8B%B1%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%BA%8B%E4%BB%B6%E6%9F%A5%E6%B8%85%23&amp;from=default">#山东省任城监狱疫情事件查清#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%BB%E5%9F%8E%E7%9B%91%E7%8B%B1%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%B3%BB%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E9%A9%BE%E8%BD%A6%E8%87%AA%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E8%BF%94%E5%9B%9E%E5%90%8E%E4%BC%A0%E6%9F%93%E7%BB%99%E5%B9%B2%E8%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#任城监狱疫情系人员驾车自武汉返回后传染给干警#</a>】今天，记者从中央政法委获悉：日前，经中央批准，由中央政法委副秘书长雷东生任组长，中央政法委、最高人民检察院、公安部、司法部有关负责同志参加的调查组，就山东省任城监狱疫情事件进行了全面调查，主要情况已查 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/Ix3dk1pxr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4478771820336501:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4478771820336501&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">
                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->
                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Ix3eJ9Dpj&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 投诉 -->
                    <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=2749715460&amp;screen_name=胡不该" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2749715460&amp;cid=4478772692296437&amp;nick=胡不该&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">
                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4478772692296437&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=2749715460&amp;commentmid=4478771820336501" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>30</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-4 15:14</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->
            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

                                                                                                             <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4478884080489896:fromprofile\"> 2020-3-4 22:37<\/a> 来自 <a class=\"S_txt2\" suda-uatrack=\"key=profile_feed&value=pubfrom_guest\" action-type=\"app_source\" target=\"_blank\" href=\"https:\/\/app.weibo.com\/t\/feed\/6vtZb0\" rel=\"nofollow\">微博 weibo.com<\/a>            \t            <\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"央视新闻\">\n                                                                                                                        【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%A2%E6%B5%AE%E5%AE%AB%E9%87%8D%E6%96%B0%E5%BC%80%E6%94%BE%23&from=default\">#卢浮宫重新开放#<\/a>】据法国媒体报道，当地时间4日中午，卢浮宫博物馆已重新恢复对公众开放。据了解，1日起，卢浮宫员工担忧新冠病毒扩散，集体表决通过利用“特殊的停工权力”暂时关闭了博物馆。早前，为控制疫情进一步恶化，法国政府宣布取消所有封闭环境中超过5000人的大型活动。（总台记者马瑾瑾）
